merpi_desc: %USER's knot. Inflated or knot, it's still there for you to ponder the orb. Or you could always just reach out and...?

merpi_normal: %USER buries their knot in %TARGET's %T_PART, trying to lock them together!!
merpi_flowery: %USER buries their knot in %TARGET's %T_PART, trying to lock them together!!

merpi_normal: %USER slips their knot into %TARGET's %T_PART momentarily before it pulling it out again!
merpi_flowery: %USER slips their knot into %TARGET's %T_PART momentarily before it pulling it out again!
merpi_repeat: %USER slips their knot in and out of %TARGET's %T_PART!

merpi_normal: %USER eases their knot into place for %TARGET's %T_PART, holding it there for a long moment!
merpi_flowery: %USER eases their knot into place for %TARGET's %T_PART, holding it there for a long moment!
merpi_repeat: %USER almost ties their knot in place for %TARGET's %T_PART!

merpi_normal: %USER jams their knot into %TARGET's %T_PART like they're trying to bury the bone!
merpi_flowery: %USER jams their knot into %TARGET's %T_PART like they're trying to bury the bone!
merpi_repeat: %USER jams their knot in place for %TARGET's %T_PART!
